title: Friendly tech type
content:
Hello. i am trying to find an alternative to Typ 1451.  
I saw this typeface and thought it might work. Please help me identify it.  
Thank you.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_79.JPG) | 293.61 KB |
author: sixthirty

comments.content:
I'm sorry but I do see Optimo Hermes, using the [alternate "monospaced" /i](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/www.optimo.ch/typefaces_Hermes_all_CharacterMap.html).  
Some alternatives: [Bryant](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/processtypefoundry.com/fonts/bryant-2/), [Gotham Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/gotham-rounded/overview), [Courier Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/lineto.com/The+Fonts/Font+Categories/Text+Fonts/Courier+Sans), [Gravostyle](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/www.optimo.ch/typefaces_Gravostyle-Basic.html) (probably the closest to Typ451), [Houschka Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/g-type/houschka-rounded), [VAG Rounded](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008025646/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/vag+rounded)
